titleStmt.title: A relation of the second voyage to Guiana. Perfourmed and written in the yeare 1596. By Lawrence Kemys, Gent
titleStmt.author: Kemys, Lawrence, d. 1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Dawson, dwelling at the three Cranes in the Vintree, and are to be solde,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The second voyage to Guiana.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the three Cranes in the Vintree
